list_definition.definition: the state of being active or lively

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The streets are full of activity this morning.

list_definition.definition: something which one does as a pastime, as part of one’s job etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His free time activities include fishing and golf.

list_definition.definition: things which people do in order to achieve an aim
